text: (If you don't want to use [JodaTime](http://www.joda.org/joda-time/)) Use [`TimeZone`](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/TimeZone.html) with [`setRawOffset`](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/TimeZone.html#setRawOffset(int)) with code from this answer: https://stackoverflow.com/a/19378721/360211
